ai-mn28:0.2_0: The Longer Simile of the Elephant’s Footprint
ai-mn28:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-mn28:2.1_0: “The footprints of all creatures that walk can fit inside an elephant’s footprint, so an elephant’s footprint is said to be the biggest of them all.
ai-mn28:2.2_0: In the same way, all skillful qualities can be included in the four noble truths.
ai-mn28:2.3_0: What are the teachings grouped by four?
ai-mn28:2.4_0: The noble truths of suffering, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.
ai-mn28:3.1_0: And what is the noble truth of suffering?
ai-mn28:3.2_0: Rebirth is suffering; old age is suffering; death is suffering; sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress are suffering; not getting what you wish for is suffering.
ai-mn28:3.2_1: In brief, the five aspects of existence affected by grasping are suffering.
ai-mn28:3.3_0: And what are the five grasping aggregates?
ai-mn28:3.4_0: The grasping aggregates of form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-mn28:4.1_0: And what is the grasping aggregate of form?
ai-mn28:4.2_0: The four primary elements, and form derived from the four primary elements.
ai-mn28:5.1_0: And what are the four primary elements?
ai-mn28:6.1_0: And what is the earth element?
ai-mn28:6.2_0: The earth element may be interior or exterior.
ai-mn28:6.3_0: And what is the interior earth element?
ai-mn28:6.4_0: Anything hard, solid, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual. This includes
ai-mn28:6.5_0: head hair, body hair, nails, teeth, skin, flesh, sinews, bones, bone marrow, kidneys, heart, liver, diaphragm, spleen, lungs, intestines, mesentery, undigested food, feces, or anything else hard, solid, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual.
ai-mn28:6.6_0: This is called the interior earth element.
ai-mn28:6.7_0: The interior earth element and the exterior earth element are just the earth element.
ai-mn28:6.8_0: This should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn28:6.9_0: When you truly see with right understanding, you grow disillusioned with the earth element, detaching the mind from the earth element.
ai-mn28:7.1_0: There comes a time when the exterior water element flares up.
ai-mn28:7.2_0: At that time the exterior earth element vanishes.
ai-mn28:7.3_0: So for all its great age, the earth element will be revealed as impermanent, liable to end, vanish, and perish.
ai-mn28:7.4_0: What then of this ephemeral body appropriated by craving? Rather than take it to be ‘I’ or ‘mine’ or ‘I am’, they still just consider it to be none of these things. ...
ai-mn28:7.4_1: Rather than take it to be ‘I’ or ‘mine’ or ‘I am’, they still just consider it to be none of these things. ...
ai-mn28:8.1_0: If others abuse, attack, harass, and trouble that mendicant, they understand:
ai-mn28:8.2_0: ‘This painful feeling born of ear contact has arisen in me.
ai-mn28:8.3_0: yet this is not the reason.
ai-mn28:8.6_0: They see that contact, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are impermanent.
ai-mn28:8.7_0: Their mind becomes eager, confident, settled, and decided in that perception.
ai-mn28:9.1_0: Others might treat that mendicant with disliking, loathing, and detestation,
ai-mn28:9.2_0: striking them with fists, stones, sticks, and swords.
ai-mn28:9.4_0: ‘This body is such that fists, stones, sticks, and swords strike it.
ai-mn28:9.5_0: But the Buddha has said in the Simile of the Saw:
ai-mn28:9.6_0: “Even if low-down bandits were to sever you limb from limb, anyone who had a malevolent thought on that account would not be following my instructions.”
ai-mn28:9.7_0: My energy is roused up and unflagging, my mindfulness is established and lucid, my body is tranquil and undisturbed, and my mind is immersed in samādhi.
ai-mn28:9.8_0: Gladly now, let fists, stones, sticks, and swords strike this body! For this is how the instructions of the Buddhas are followed.’
ai-mn28:10.1_0: While recollecting the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha in this way, equanimity based on the skillful may not become stabilized in them.
ai-mn28:10.2_0: So he is struck with a sense of urgency:
ai-mn28:10.4_0: that while recollecting the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha in this way, equanimity based on the skillful does not become stabilized in me.’
ai-mn28:10.5_0: Suppose there was a daughter-in-law who was struck with a daughter-in-law.
ai-mn28:10.6_0: In the same way, if, while recollecting the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha in this way, equanimity based on the skillful does not become stabilized in them, they don’t become stabilized in that.
ai-mn28:10.7_1: that a disciple recollects the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha in this way, equanimity based on the skillful does not become stabilized in me.’
ai-mn28:10.8_0: But if, while recollecting the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha in this way, equanimity based on the skillful does become stabilized in them, they’re happy with that.
ai-mn28:10.9_0: At this point, much has been done by that mendicant.
ai-mn28:11.1_0: And what is the water element?
ai-mn28:11.2_0: The water element may be interior or exterior.
ai-mn28:11.3_0: And what is the interior water element?
ai-mn28:11.4_0: Anything that’s water, watery, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual. This includes
ai-mn28:11.5_0: it’s just a little bit of blood, a urine, spit, or pus, or blood.
ai-mn28:11.6_0: This is called the interior water element.
ai-mn28:11.7_0: The interior water element and the exterior water element are just the water element.
ai-mn28:11.8_0: This should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn28:11.9_0: When you truly see with right understanding, you grow disillusioned with the water element, detaching the mind from the water element.
ai-mn28:12.1_0: There comes a time when the exterior water element flares up.
ai-mn28:12.2_0: They also raid villages, towns, and cities, and countries.
ai-mn28:12.3_0: There comes a time when the water in the ocean sinks down a hundred leagues, or two, three, four, five, six, up to seven hundred leagues.
ai-mn28:12.4_0: There comes a time when the water in the ocean stands just seven palm trees deep, or six, five, four, three, two, or even just one palm tree deep.
ai-mn28:12.5_0: There comes a time when the water in the ocean stands just seven fathoms deep, or six, five, four, three, two, or even just one fathom deep.
ai-mn28:12.6_0: There comes a time when the water in the ocean stands just half a fathom deep, or waist deep, or knee deep, or even just ankle deep.
ai-mn28:12.7_0: There comes a time when there isn’t enough water in the ocean even to wet the tip of your finger.
ai-mn28:12.8_0: So for all its great age, the water element will be revealed as impermanent, liable to end, vanish, and perish.
ai-mn28:13.1_0: What then of this ephemeral body appropriated by craving? Rather than take it to be ‘I’ or ‘mine’ or ‘I am’, they still just consider it to be none of these things. ...
ai-mn28:13.1_1: Rather than take it to be ‘I’ or ‘mine’ or ‘I am’, they still just consider it to be none of these things. ...
ai-mn28:14.1_0: While recollecting the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha in this way, equanimity based on the skillful may become stabilized in them.
ai-mn28:14.1_1: They’re happy with that, and they’re happy.
ai-mn28:15.1_0: At this point, much has been done by that mendicant.
ai-mn28:16.1_0: And what is the fire element?
ai-mn28:16.2_0: The fire element may be interior or exterior.
ai-mn28:16.3_0: And what is the interior fire element?
ai-mn28:16.4_0: Anything that’s fire, fiery, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual. This includes
ai-mn28:16.5_0: that which warms, that which heats you up when feverish, that which properly digests food and drink, or anything else that’s fire, fiery, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual.
ai-mn28:16.6_0: This is called the interior fire element.
ai-mn28:16.7_0: The interior fire element and the exterior fire element are just the fire element.
ai-mn28:16.8_0: This should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn28:16.9_0: When you truly see with right understanding, you grow disillusioned with the fire element, detaching the mind from the fire element.
ai-mn28:17.1_0: There comes a time when the exterior fire element flares up.
ai-mn28:17.2_0: It burns up villages, towns, cities, countries, and regions until
ai-mn28:17.3_0: it reaches a green field, a roadside, a cliff’s edge, a body of water, or cleared parkland, where it’s extinguished for lack of fuel.
ai-mn28:17.4_0: There comes a time when they go looking for a fire, taking just chicken feathers and strips of sinew as kindling.
ai-mn28:17.5_0: So for all its great age, the fire element will be revealed as impermanent, liable to end, vanish, and perish.
ai-mn28:17.6_0: What then of this ephemeral body appropriated by craving? Rather than take it to be ‘I’ or ‘mine’ or ‘I am’, they still just consider it to be none of these things. ...
ai-mn28:18-20.1_0: Rather than take it to be ‘I’ or ‘mine’ or ‘I am’, they still just consider it to be none of these things. ...
ai-mn28:18-20.1_1: But if, while recollecting the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha in this way, equanimity based on the skillful does become stabilized in them, they’re happy with that.
ai-mn28:18-20.2_0: At this point, much has been done by that mendicant.
ai-mn28:21.1_0: And what is the air element?
ai-mn28:21.2_0: The air element may be interior or exterior.
ai-mn28:21.3_0: And what is the interior air element?
ai-mn28:21.4_0: Anything that’s air, airy, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual. This includes
ai-mn28:21.5_0: winds that go up or down, winds in the belly or the bowels, winds that flow through the limbs, in-breaths and out-breaths, or anything else that’s wind, windy, and appropriated that’s internal, pertaining to an individual.
ai-mn28:21.6_0: This is called the interior air element.
ai-mn28:21.7_0: The interior air element and the exterior air element are just the air element.
ai-mn28:21.8_0: This should be truly seen with right understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’
ai-mn28:21.9_0: When you truly see with right understanding, you reject the air element, detaching the mind from the air element.
ai-mn28:22.1_0: There comes a time when the exterior air element flares up.
ai-mn28:22.2_0: They also raid villages, towns, and cities, and countries.
ai-mn28:22.3_0: There comes a time, in the last month of summer, when they look for wind by using a palm-leaf or fan, and even the grasses in the drip-fringe of a thatch roof don’t stir.
ai-mn28:22.4_0: So for all its great age, the air element will be revealed as impermanent, liable to end, vanish, and perish.
ai-mn28:22.5_0: What then of this ephemeral body appropriated by craving? Rather than take it to be ‘I’ or ‘mine’ or ‘I am’, they still just consider it to be none of these things. ...

ai-mn28:24.5_0: Gladly now, let fists, stones, sticks, and swords strike this body!
ai-mn28:24.5_1: for the instructions of the Buddhas are doing.

ai-mn28:26.1_0: When a space is enclosed by sticks, creepers, grass, and mud it becomes known as a ‘building’.
ai-mn28:26.2_0: In the same way, when a space is enclosed by bones, sinews, flesh, and skin it becomes known as a ‘form’.
ai-mn28:27.1_0: Reverends, though the eye is intact internally, so long as exterior sights don’t come into range and there’s no corresponding engagement, there’s no manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.
ai-mn28:27.2_0: Though the eye is intact internally and exterior sights come into range, so long as there’s no corresponding engagement, there’s no manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.
ai-mn28:27.3_0: But when the eye is intact internally and exterior sights come into range and there is appropriate for you.
ai-mn28:27.3_1: That is how there is the appearance of consciousness.
ai-mn28:28.1_0: consciousness inclusion with form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness. Then they go in contemplating with the five grasping aggregates, is included in feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-mn28:28.3_0: ‘It seems that these five grasping aggregates have included in the five grasping aggregates.
ai-mn28:28.5_0: “One who sees dependent origination and sees dependent origination.
ai-mn28:28.7_0: And these five grasping aggregates are dependently originated.
ai-mn28:28.8_0: You regarding these five grasping aggregates is attachment.
ai-mn28:28.9_0: Giving up and getting rid of desire and greed for these five grasping aggregates is the cessation of suffering.’

ai-mn28:33-34.1_0: Because his ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...

ai-mn28:38.1_0: Though the mind is intact internally and exterior thoughts come into range, so long as there’s no corresponding engagement, there’s no manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.
ai-mn28:38.2_0: But when the mind is intact internally and exterior thoughts come into range and there is corresponding engagement, there is the manifestation of the corresponding type of consciousness.

ai-mn28:38.13_0: This is what Venerable Sāriputta said.
ai-mn28:38.14_0: Satisfied, the mendicants were happy with what Venerable Sāriputta said.
ai-mn28:38.15_0: The eighth sub-chapter on the Elephant is finished.
